questions_and_notes: Can we describe this as the "surface air" value or would that differ from the value in the lowest layer? It needs a scalar vertical coordinate.  Note that in general "area: mean" will give a lower maximum if data are mapped to a coarser grid than the original.  Could consider reversing order of area and time
specific_issues: 2:Modify dimensions.  Add or remove scalar coordinate.
long_name: Daily Maximum O3 Volume Mixing Ratio in Lowest Model Layer
comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.
